choices: A Student
Faculty
1.content:
Connor was an 8th grader, 13 years of age. His hair was ridiculously dark brown and his eyes were brown as well. He was the school's deadpan snarker. But Connor also had a secret he kept from all: he had a fetish for pregnant women. It didn't matter how plain a girl looked- if she was pregnant, he wanted her.

One day, while walking to first period, he spied a solid gold ring. Curious, he rubbed it. It seemed to do nothing, but a few seconds later, a voice inside his head made itself known.

'Put the ring in your pocket,' it commanded. Connor's mind was unsure, but his body had already decided.

'You have obtained the Pregnancy Ring,' said the voice.

'The what?' Connor asked.

'The Pregnancy Ring allows you to create new pregnancies or edit existing ones, finetuning them to your preferences. However, only women who were on campus when you picked it up can come under the ring's influence.'

'That sounds perfect. When can I use it?'

'Right now!'

Connor was excited, but he was unsure who to use the ring on first.
1.title: Meet Our Hero

choices: Megan Long- the prissy girl.
Cherie Fircrest- the nerdy girl.
Nicole Hulitzer- the best friend's twin sister.
Someone Else?
11.content:
Truth told, his first instinct was the girl two seats ahead and one towards the window from him in his first period class, Megan Long. She had blonde hair with dark roots, frosted tips, mid-length hair. Kind of a messy-chic that he saw from behind more often than not. Curvy but not thicc, with soft features and a tendency to wear clothes just a little snug. She wore too much makeup, and had a bit of a prissy attitude most of the time. She didn't like him much.

         At the very end of last year, it was rumored that she got pregnant by her on-again, off-again boyfriend, whom she dumped on the last day of school. The notion captured his imagination all summer long, and he couldn't wait to see what truth came of it come September. When school started and she wasn't showing, an entire summer of fantasy came to nought.

         His eyes moved to the left one, catching on another girl hard at work chewing on her pencil. Cherie Fircrest. She'd been a staple in his life since kindergarten, when she lived down the street in the apartments at the end of the block. Her dad was the chief of police in town, a big African American man; her mother was reportedly part Shawnee. This gave Cherie a look that stood out from the norm- features that marked her as different, but pretty. He'd had an eye on her since as long as he could remember.

         She had been friends with him, back when they lived close together, until her parents moved into a house outside of town. Overnight, she stopped talking to him, stopped looking at him. It was as if her moving had made her a different person. She was a very smart girl, always receiving top marks in class, and as Connor was at best a B-student, it was one more thing driving a wedge between them.

         It was here that Nicole Hulitzer, the twin sister of his best friend Nick Hulitzer, hit him in the back of the head with her ruler. "Hey Connerd- you got some paper I can borrow?"

         Connor frowned and turned towards her, "You're out of paper already? What the hell, Nicole... are you eating it or something?"

Choose one! came the voice, more commanding this time. He didn't really have time to think about a response- the name just popped into his head:
11.title: A Student

choices: Follow her to see what happens.
Stay put and find someone else
Something Else
113.content:
a look of anger came upon her, “Do I have to kick you?” She angrily spoke against him. He reluctantly handed off a small stack and, in the span of time it took to turn, she was back at her desk, with the larger share he previously had, the small stack that he has taken off from it was left in his hands.
         ”Guess this is mine.” He grieved
         “so shall it be done!” the voice within his head spoke aloud.

         As sudden as the voice came,a loud gurgle erupted within the room. All eyes shifted, trying to find its source when it occurred once more, eyes on Nicole as she looked so discomfited, wearing a belly shirt and Jeggings when she rose and rushed from sight, immediately snatching the pass from the teacher and running off toward the gn bathrooms.
113.title: Nicole Hulitzer- the best friend's twin sis...

choices: ...he finds her hurking into the waste bin down the hall.
...he sees her duck into the girls bathroom.
...he runs into Someone Else.
1131.content:
Her sudden departure was strange, and Conner noticed, above and beyond what everyone else noticed- the voice in his head gave him insight, so he knew where the sound had come from. But it was clear that everyone in the room had heard the gurgle. Would they notice if anything else happened?

If you wish, came the voice in his head.

         "No, I don't wish that at all!" he whispered.

         The teacher spoke up, "Connor, what was that?"

         He sat up in his chair, "I wish to be excused, ma'am. I'm not feeling well."

         A furrowed frown, "Nicole has the pass."

         He retorted, "I'm gonna throw up..."

         A sigh, "Go, then. Here, I'll write you a note..."

         He was rushing out the door, "No time!"

In the hallway,
1131.title: Follow her to see what happens.

choices: {/b}WELL TOUGH COOKIES, MY POWERS DON’T WORK THAT WAY.{/b}
{/b}VERY WELL A FAKE PREGNANCY IT IS.{/b}
11312.content:
As he hurried out the class room he caught sight of Nicole rushing into the nearest girl’s restroom.

What happened to her? He asked glancing at the ring.

She has started feeling the effects of her new pregnancy, the voice explained curtly.

“Effects? What sort of effects?” Connor asked still very unfamiliar with all the symptoms of pregnancy.

Most likely nausea and vomiting from morning sickness, the voice explained further.

“Vomiting don’t make her do that!” He cried not wanting his friend’s sister to have to go through that.

Nichole had just kneeled at the toilet seat and threw her head back in preparation to hurl, when suddenly the nausea was completely gone. Nichole blinked in astonishment as she felt perfectly fine. She slowly stood up and wondered what had caused her sudden sickness.

It is done, the voice decreed. “So, Nichole is now pregnant?” He asked leisurely walking to the restroom Nichole darted into.

Yes, a child grows within her, the voice exclaimed in the same hokey tone. “I don’t know about this, is she gonna have to give birth, that’s painful right, I don’t want her to be hurt, and who’s the father?

Yes, Yes, Yes, and YOU ARE, the voice answer with dramatic flair at Conner’s new paternity. Connor froze in his place as the implication washed over him.

“What I don’t want kids, this is crazy, we’re too young for this, you have to fix this.” He exclaimed grabbing his ring hand and shaking it in a panic.

Caught a little of guard the voice was silent for a moment before replying. Excuse me?

“I mean, I just think pregnant women look hot… I uh, I like their big bellies.” He explained blushing intensely.

What seriously, ahem I mean, do you wish that there was child and she would only appear pregnant, the voice inquired its authoritative façade dropping for a moment.

Connor looked off in the distance before looking back at the ring, and uncertainly responded with a shrug. “I guess, that would work.”
11312.title: ...he sees her duck into the girls bathroom.

choices: He takes things slow.
He makes her big.
He makes her unnaturally big.
Something else.
113122.content:
Very well, she will only appear to be pregnant, I assume that will be your preferred method, the voice inquired. Connor thought for a moment before responding. “Unless I say otherwise.” He said holding up his finger as a professor would when correcting a student. Very well So shall it be DONE, the voice replied. “Sweet!” Connor cheered pumping his fist.

At that moment Nichole stepped out of the restroom and almost walked right into Connor. She recoiled in surprise at Connor’s unexpected presence. “What are you doing Connerd.” She demanded crossing her arms and staring at him accusingly.

The dumbfounded Conner looked around confused and answered honestly. “Uh, I was worried about you.” His response cause Nichole to blush a little, not that she like him. “Idiot, come on, let’s go.” She said motioning for Connor to follow.

The two stooled back to the class, neither one really interested in getting back to class. Nichole was checking her phone and Connor followed behind, catching glimpses of Nichole’s midriff, he was disappointed to find it hadn’t changed at all.

He fell behind and asked the ring. “Hey, what gives she’s still skinny.” He whispered quietly, the ring responded, even though she will seem to be pregnant, she has not progressed any.

“Oh right, then can we make her bigger?” He asked glancing at the ring. Just think it and I shall fulfill your desires, the ring exclaimed. “Good, I want her to notice.” he said with a mischievous smirk.
113122.title: {/b}VERY WELL A FAKE PREGNANCY IT IS.{/b}

choices: Connor asks Nichole if she is okay.
Connor decides to mess with another girl.
Nichole decides to tell Connor about her condition.
Connor makes Nichole a little bigger.
Something else.
1131221.content:
Nichole was disinterestedly tapping and swiping her phone, when something made her stop in her tracks. The hem of her jeggings started to pinch, she looked down in confusion and saw that she looked bloated. She furrowed her brow and hesitantly reached for her puffy middle. Before she did though, her stomach gurgled again and swelled an inch bigger before her very eyes.

Nichole was stunned, too shocked to even scream. Connor had watched the whole thing unfold and snuck up next to her. “You okay, Nickie.”

In a panic she wrapped her arms around her stomach and nervously croaked. “I… I’m fine, and don’t you Nickie me, CONNERD!” She glared at him her face as red as a beet. He smiled smugly at her embarrassment and sauntered in front of her, leaving her to worry about her sudden transformation.

He loved messing with her and he guessed she was the same, Connor just though she looked kind of cute when she was annoyed.

Nichole glared at Connor the big dork, what was he thinking acting all concerned about her, it made her heart flutter, and why did her stomach swell up like that. Did it have something to do with her feeling sick earlier, something weird was going on. She looked down at her bloated middle and poked it experimentally, it was firm but had a lot of give.

As the two returned to class the teacher sarcastically said. “Ah, the love birds return.”

“We do not love each other.” Both of them cried to the amusement of the whole class, the teacher calmed the class down and said. “I’m just kidding, now take your seat.”

Nichole returned the hall pass and they both took their seats blushing intensely as their class mates snickered.
1131221.title: He takes things slow.

choices: “Sigh, Alright, So, say that I believe you.”
“What are you talking about, you’re delusional?”
“Look after class we can talk about this later.”
Something else.
11312213.content:
She leaned forward and whispered to him. “Psst, Connor I need to tell you something.” The use of his actual name caught his attention, he glanced back at her noticing her worried expression. For some reason her pleading gaze tugged at his heart, he had to listen.

With a defeated sigh he asked. “What is it.”

Her eyes narrowed as she looked around to see if anyone noticed their conversation over the teacher’s rambling. When the coast was clear she whispered. I think my belly got bigger. Connor’s eyes got wide and he blushed slightly, before he quickly regained his composure as said. “So, you’ve gotten fat.”

She lightly struck the back of his head and explained further. “No, I mean I just saw my belly get bigger, it blew up like a balloon, I think it had something to do with me feeling sick earlier.”

Connor face started getting flushed, he tried to play it cool. This is so hot, he thought as he stared at her doubtingly. “Are you sure, let me see.”

Nichole was also starting to blush, and dismissively replied. “Not now, after class.” She said glancing around again.

Turning around to calm himself down he told her. “So, you think your belly got bigger, so what do you want me to do about it.?” He glanced back at her waiting for a response.

She looked to be at a loss for words and after thinking about it she replied. “I don’t know, it’s weird, I don’t know what’s going on and I’m scared. I just want to know I can count on you.”

He had never seen Nichole act like this before. What should he do?

If he says he believes her, it might get suspicious if he is the only one that notices her change. He might need to let others see the changes or risk her figuring out he is the cause.

If he says he doesn’t believe her, he might hurt her feelings and good luck getting anywhere near her to enjoy her changes. He might as well find another girl but being his best friend’s sister means he’ll naturally spend a lot of time with her.

This was a sticky situation for the little perv, and she was beginning to look mad now, since he was taking so long weighting the pros and con.

“What’s taking so long do you believe me or not.” She snarled.
11312213.title: Nichole decides to tell Connor about her condit...

choices: She agreed to help a friend with a science project.
She had tried to performed a magic ritual from the internet.
She saw strange lights when she went to bed last night.
Reader’s choice.
Reader’s choice.
113122131.content:
She looked at him shocked, almost as if she couldn’t believe he actually listened to her.

She averted her eyes and blushed as she smiled. “Thanks Connor.”

Once again, her reaction made him feel weird, she was always so mean and rude to him. Her treating him like an actual person started making new feelings stir in him.

After class dismissed Nichole and Connor snuck off to inspect her body. “See I’m huge.” She cried presenting her stomach to him, He gave her an annoyed look, thoroughly unimpressed by her little tum. “You are not huge.”

Nichole returned his annoyed look as she explained. “It’s huge to me.” She started thinking about it. “Okay, let’s put our heads together and figure out what happened to mmeeEEEEEE.” She said her voice rising as she felt Connor’s hand rubbing her belly.

She looked down and stared daggers at him. “What are you doing!” He looked up in confusion before realizing his mistake and timidly responds. “Checking to see if it’s real, It’s really soft.” He chuckled nervously as Nichole’s scowling face glowed bright red.

“Keep your hands to yourself!” She cried smacking him. “Ow, okay got it.”

Nichole started pacing as she talked about the events of the day, not knowing what to say Connor asked with a shrug. “So, has anything weird happened to you recently.”

Nichole froze as she thought about it when a look of realization washed over her.

“It couldn’t be, there is no way.” She stammered as if she had just remembered something, Connor’s eyes widened at the revelation. “No way, what?”
113122131.title: “Sigh, Alright, So, say that I believe you.”

choices: “I might happen to think you look cute.”
“I don’t know but maybe you can find him.”
Something else.
1131221312.content:
Nichole looked at Connor slowly her face worried face staring intently at him. “I may have tried performing a ritual I saw on the internet.”

Connor stared at her in disbelief. Oh boy, the voice replied sarcastically amused by the ridiculous idea.

We’ll as you know I’ve had trouble getting a boyfriend.” Nichole explained as she whipped out her phone. “NOO, really!” Connor exclaimed sarcastically, which resulted in a light smack to his head by Nichole. “I wonder why.” He continued in the same tone as he rubbed his head.

“Anyway, so I looked on the internet and found this.” She told Connor as she showed him her phone. On her phone was a webpage for amateur witches that listed a collection of rituals. “The Lonely Teen’s Guide to Witchcraft.” He read out the name of the webpage with an annoyed tone.

“I know, it’s really stupid but I thought what’s the harm, so I may have done this.” She said bringing up the ritual in question.

“The Ritual of the Longing Heart, this ritual will make you irresistible to your soul mate, and bring you to his attention.” Connor read in utter confusion, he gave her a skeptical look and asked her. “Are you serious?”

“I know but look at me, how do you explain this, I must have done the ritual wrong or something and it cursed me.”

Connor thought about her crazy idea and laughed at its absurdity until he thought about how he just happened upon the ring, was the ring sent because of her spell, was he actually her soul mate.

Oh my gosh, have I merely been the tool of an even greater cosmic force, the voice in the ring exclaimed getting swept up in the crazy idea. “Will you shut up.” Connor quietly snarled, to which Nichole replied. “What was that,”

Thinking quickly Connor replied “I was just thinking, maybe you aren’t cursed, maybe this is irresistible to your soul mate.”

Nichole looked at him with disgust and replied. “Oh please, who’d find this gross gut attractive.”

He glared at her indifferently and said. “Are you kidding there are tons of guys that like big bellies.” Nichole looked at him in confusion before it dawned on her. “Oh yeah, like chubby chasers. So, my soul mate is one of those but who.” She asked as she stroked her chin in contemplation.
1131221312.title: She had tried to performed a magic ritual from ...

choices: Nichole’s brother and Connor’s friend Nick
Nichole’s friend Angela.
The mean girl of school Tiffany.
Someone else.
11312213121.content:
Deciding to use her wild idea Connor confessed. “You know I happen to think that belly looks cute on you.” Connor said nervously as his face grew red.

Nichole stared at him in disbelief her face flushed for a moment before her face contorted into a disgusted frown. “Oh no, no… no, no, no.” She said her face growing more and more comically disgusted with each horrified outburst. “You, you are my soul mate.”

“No, no absolutely not.” She said waving her hands in protest. Connor glared at her in annoyance feeling utterly insulted.

“Look Connerd, just cause you’re a freaky perv doesn’t mean we’re soul mates okay.” She said poking him in the chest angrily. “There is no way a dork like you is my soul mate, you can’t be the only weirdo in this school.” She said brushing him off as she turned away.

“Why not, maybe I do like you.” He said confidently standing straight and staring at her intensely. She was taken aback by his confession her face flushed red.

She noticed the anger in his gaze and stopped her overly dramatic little tie raid and nonchalantly tried to defuse the situation. “Okay, maybe you like me and maybe I don’t totally hate your guts but how do we know this means were soul mates.”

Getting an idea, Connor used the power of the ring and Nichole suddenly swelled bigger her puffy first trimester belly inflating to the size of five months.

Nichole cried in shock as her hands flew to her new bulge. Connor walked up to her and said. “While there might be plenty of chubby chasers at school, I happen to like pregnant women.” He gave the dumbfounded Nichole’s maternal bump a light pat.

“Hey you two what are you doing.” The voice belonging to…
11312213121.title: “I might happen to think you look cute.”

info.brief_description: An eighth grader discovers a ring and uses it to satisfy his pregnancy fetish.
info.description:
hello all this is an old story the sadly the creator deleted his account and so using magic it will be reborn lets bring this story back!
creator is Bad Commando Name please enjoy all I found


Here's a CYOA loosely based on my middle school. This is my first work, so any and all help is welcome.

Rules:
-No m/m or f/f
-No changing protagonist
-Stick to pregnancy fetish- no vore, BE, etc.
-Must have good grammar
-No mpreg.
-No killing off characters. That means you, Superboy-Prime.
-Keep it PG-13.
